name: Camel Cycle
description:
The scorching heat of the desert is one every camel MUST endure!

Play through a randomly-generated level on a platformer that is inspired by the majestic Sahara Desert!

Face all kinds of terrestrial foes, as an indifferent camel that merely wishes to go on with his day.

Features in this Version:

-2 enemies so far: Foxes and Scorpions

-More desert enemies to come soon

-Please give feedback for enemies you would like to see in later updates

Controls:

-A or Left Arrow Key to go left

-D or Right Arrow Key to go right

-W or Up Arrow Key to jump
